name: CVG Fullscreen + Kudos in sidebar
description:
This is a minor alteration to Xamm's userstyle for 'computerandvideogames.com'. Basically it is exactly the same (all alterations are only commented out) apart from a couple of refinements to the general layout, notably the return of a users kudos in the sidebar.

As with Xamm's original this is also only for the forum section of the site, meaning that all other parts of the site will display as normal.

Enjoy!

discussions.name: Thanks a lot dude, I was looking for this.
